name: test_kubernetes_plugin
description:
arrange: given a Jenkins charm with kubernetes plugin installed and credentials from microk8s.
    act: Run a job using an agent provided by the kubernetes plugin.
    assert: Job succeeds.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given a Jenkins charm with kubernetes plugin installed and credentials from microk8s.
act: Run a job using an agent provided by the kubernetes plugin.
assert: Job succeeds.
